stats.slightly-careless.advice: You need to concentrate more on the road and try to distract less.
stats.careless.advice: You need to dedicate more time to improving your driving skills, otherwise you will be punished.
stats.reckless.advice: You need to immediately improve your driving skills, otherwise you will be punished!
